sentences.en: And the illusory middle class has to face its economic reality.
sentences.cn: 虚幻的中产阶级需要面对其经济现实.

sentences.en: First impressions can often prove illusory.
sentences.cn: 第一印象往往被证明是不真实的。

sentences.en: Her impression with regard to Isabel's writing was quite illusory.
sentences.cn: 关于伊莎贝尔的写作,她完全是凭空捏造的.

sentences.en: Illusionist : Illusory Allies - Reduced damage and health of summoned illusions.
sentences.cn: Illu:IllusoryAllies,降低所成幻影的伤害和生命值.

sentences.en: It seemed to an idealistic and illusory dream.
sentences.cn: 那似乎是个不切实际、理想主义的美梦。

sentences.en: It'seemed to an idealistic and illusory dream.
sentences.cn: 那似乎是个不切实际、理想主义的美梦.

sentences.en: Most often mist hides the illusory Alps.
sentences.cn: 云雾常常遮掩了梦幻般的阿尔卑斯山脉.

sentences.en: Some of his disappointments were more illusory than real.
sentences.cn: 他的一些失望,与其说是真实的,不如说是虚构的.

sentences.en: The barriers erected by species were porous and illusory.
sentences.cn: 而树立在物种之间的所谓屏障是虚幻的,能够穿透的.

sentences.en: The certainties proclaimed by Newton mechanics are illusory.
sentences.cn: 由牛顿力学所表明的确定性是一种错误.

sentences.en: This atmosphere is not lifted shares in circulation as illusory.
sentences.cn: 这种新气象,并非因为解禁股流通徒有虚名.

sentences.en: Worth of dust are illusory, only the immediate and should be true.
sentences.cn: 万般尘埃皆虚幻, 唯有眼前故应真.

sentences.en: You can cloak yourself in shadows or trick foes with illusory forms.
sentences.cn: 你能在阴影中伪装自己或用虚幻的形象戏弄敌人.

words.tran_cn: 错觉的；幻影的；迷惑人的
幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰
魔术师；爱幻想的人；幻觉论者；幻觉派的艺术家
错觉的；幻影的；虚假的；产生幻觉的

trans.tran_cn: <正>貌似真实的，虚幻的，虚无缥缈
trans.tran_en: false but seeming to be real or true
